name: Princess in the dungeon
description: Credits: Angler man model from piacenti under CC-BY-SA 3.0. http://opengameart.org/users/piacenti, Woman 3D Model by: Eric Tajvon from free 3d models. Remaining images are from my other games. Game is written using Twine 2. Text, excluding code for images and variables contains exactly 300 words.
